column4: hi ppl, i am having this problem in my dell laptop where something keeps resetting the boot flag to the windows partition. if i set it to the /boot partition, the next time i reboot windows, it gets set back to the windows partition. any idea what is causing this?
you have to remove setdefault from windows
let me check the file, but i don't think i have setdefault there. maybe i did add a makeactive or something like that recently
